Reviews.Title: Just what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone that would take me back to the basics, away from my high tech smart phone that was consuming all my attention...but I wanted a phone that would still allow me to access the internet and be easy to type text or emails. This phone is perfect! In one click from the main screen I'm on Facebook, Google or using GPS. The 2-way sliding keyboard and number pad are perfect for everything I need!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wifes phone
Reviews.Author: G. Mergener "Pete"
Reviews.Content: This replaces a Sprint phone that was too complicated for her to operate..........Her original phone crapped and Sprint upgraded her with a touch screen razor.......too much for her.  So now I'm upgraded!

Reviews.Title: Great for texting
Reviews.Author: keith oddie
Reviews.Content: The design of the phone is perfect for people who like to text. I really enjoy the slide out keyboard.  It's good phone, it never freezes.  Most of the issues I have are related to my wireless service carrier and not the phone.

Reviews.Title: best phone for me
Reviews.Author: jeona
Reviews.Content: it was exactly what I wanted and I got it very fast. I used to have a blue one and was happy to get it in hot pink. I love it!

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: andrea knight
Reviews.Content: Broke in one week. I wouldnt recommend this phone to anyone. Cheap feel, terrible reception. Something is rattling around inside it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung M550
Reviews.Author: Sharon Wakefield
Reviews.Content: Somethings arent working like it should be but not enough for me to not continue to use this phone.  I just wish this was still a live product for Samsung as I relally love this phone.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: I got the phone today and it's in great condition it came with the battery phone charger and of course the phone it works awesome

Reviews.Title: it came on time but......
Reviews.Author: evilpoop
Reviews.Content: I order a exclaim phone. But an instinct phone box was in the mail. At first i thought i got the wrong order but the phone i order was in the box. And in the box came with the how to get started book for the instinct phone. the book didnt help me at all because the instinct phone is a touch screen and the exclaim is not. online said the phone needed a new battery so i got a new one. but when i took off the back to put the new battery in, the inside was all sticky. the person selling it could of cleaned it or said some thing about it online. and he was still logged on to facebook on the phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung M550 Exclaim Used Cell Phone Sprint
